title: Leadership for a changing energy environment - McKinsey
summary: The article discusses the evolution of the global energy landscape and the challenges and opportunities it presents for companies in the energy sector. It highlights the need for leaders to adopt new mindsets and behaviors to succeed in this changing environment, including a focus on purpose, collaboration, and agility. This shift requires organizations to commit to leadership development and a holistic cultural transformation to attract and retain the right talent and drive performance.

title: Irwin Mitchell Launches ESG Advisory Service - Irwin Mitchell
summary: Irwin Mitchell is launching a new Environment, Social and Governance (ESG) Advisory Service for corporate and institutional clients, offering a range of services, including cyber security audits and diversity and inclusion assessments and training. The firm has identified ESG as a vital part of sustainable growth strategies for businesses, helping them attract and retain customers and gain a competitive advantage. Irwin Mitchell's ownESG journey and expertise in compliance and regulations make it an ideal partner for businesses seeking ESG advice.
